detectors.description:
Bitcoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#81-86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#83)
detectors.markdown:
[Bitcoin.transfer(address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L81-L86) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L83)

detectors.description:
Bitcoin.transferFrom(address,address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#88-94) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#89)
	- balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#91)
detectors.markdown:
[Bitcoin.transferFrom(address,address,uint256)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L88-L94) can write the state variable array at will
	Dangerous write operations:
	- [balances[from] = safeSub(balances[from],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L89)
	- [balances[to] = safeAdd(balances[to],tokens)](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L91)

detectors.description:
Bitcoin.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#63-65) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- _totalSupply - balances[address(0)] (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#64)
detectors.markdown:
[Bitcoin.totalSupply()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L63-L65) may have integer overflow
	Possible nodes:
	- [_totalSupply - balances[address(0)]](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L64)

detectors.description: solc-0.5.0 is not recommended for deployment
detectors.markdown: solc-0.5.0 is not recommended for deployment

detectors.description: Variable Bitcoin._totalSupply (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#43) is not in mixedCase

Bitcoin.constructor() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#53-61) uses literals with too many digits:
	- _totalSupply = 100000000000000000000000 (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#57)
detectors.markdown:
[Bitcoin.constructor()](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L53-L61) uses literals with too many digits:
	- [_totalSupply = 100000000000000000000000](tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#L57)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#12)
	- Bitcoin.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#63-65)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- Bitcoin.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#67-69)
	- ERC20Interface.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#13)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- ERC20Interface.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#14)
	- Bitcoin.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#71-73)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Bitcoin.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#81-86)
	- ERC20Interface.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#15)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- Bitcoin.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#75-79)
	- ERC20Interface.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#16)

safeMul(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeMul(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#32)

safeDiv(uint256,uint256) should be declared external:
	- SafeMath.safeDiv(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol#32-34)
function approve(address spender, uint tokens) public returns (bool success) { (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/Bitcoin.sol)#75
